channel.title: FunOrb Private Servers
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt][b]We Start when the team is adequately sized.[/b][/size] [hr]
[font=Trebuchet Ms][center][size=5][u][b][url=http://www.funorb.co][img]http://portal.funorb.co/sprites/logo.png[/img][/url][/b][/u][/size] [left] [ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#about]About FunOrb[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#aim]Plan[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#donation]Revenue[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#apply]Application[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#staff]Staff list[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#credit]Credit[/iurl][/li][/ul] [/left]
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] I represent the drive of every FunOrb player to help save the website we love. This project represents the dream of a better FunOrb. You represent their potential to make it a reality.
Apply or Donate. You will make a difference.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=about]2.0 - About FunOrb[/b][/size] FunOrb is RuneScape's sister site. It was launched in April of 2008. It has not received an update in two years and is now considered a discontinued product. There is no-longer a single Jagex employee working on Developing, Programming, Illustrating or Supporting the FunOrb Product in any way, shape or form.
This project is an attempt to save the top games from FunOrb and begin updating them in a manner friendly to the original games.
I believe in this cause. And I have a friend who can more than likely rally the support of the most well-known players from FunOrb to encourage the players to migrate to our servers.
Once here, they will not be disappointed. That is a promise, a promise to do everything I can to ensure the success of this project.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=aim]3.0 - Plan First we will create Private Servers for the Top five FunOrb games. Arcanists and Armies of Gielinor will receive ongoing support, while the other three will remain un-updated. Once this is accomplished, client-side versions of the single-player games will be created and hosted for free use.
The revenue will come from Donations, Membership costs, and Advertisements.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=donation]4.0 - Revenue Most of the Revenue will go to hosting and paying staff. The rest will be divided, half goes to me and the other half goes to the Community Fund. The Community Fund is a fund that the community gets to dictate the use of.
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=apply]5.0 - Application[/b][/size]
[hr] [sub]Applicants for the Programmer position [b]must[/b] be proficient enough with Private Server development to create most of a Private Server from scratch. Because that's exactly what we're doing.[/sub] [hr] [left][u][b]First and Last name[/b][/u]
[u][b]Age[/b][/u]
[u][b]Email Address[/b][/u]
[u][b]Position[/b][/u]
[u][b]Experience[/b][/u]
[u][b]Time Zone[/b][/u]
[u][b]Usual Internet Schedule[/b][/u]
[u][b]Reason for applying[/b][/u]
[u][b]Suggestions[/b][/u]
[u][b]Previous work[/b][/u]
[u][b]Other[/b][/u][/left] [hr] [hr]
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=staff]6.0 - Staff List[/b][/size]
[b][[/b]Head of Project[b]][/b][b]][/b]
Mod Corpse
[b][[/b]Sponsors[b]][/b] [b][0/∞][/b] Slot 1 Slot 2
[b][[/b]Programmers[b]][/b] [b][1/4][/b] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/supah+fly/]Supah Fly[/url] Slot 2 Slot 3 Slot 4
[b][[/b]Graphical Artists[b]][/b] [b][0/2][/b] Slot 1 Slot 2
[b][[/b]Content Developers[b]][/b] [b][0/2][/b] Slot 1 Slot 2
[b][[/b]Beta Testers[b]][/b] [b][0/3][/b] Slot 1 Slot 2 Slot 3
[center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center]
[size=2][b][anchor=credit]7.0 - Credits[/b][/size]
[b]Jagex:[/b] Abandoning FunOrb and giving us a reason. [u][/u]

item.title: FunOrb Private Servers
item.dc:creator: @iDominic iDominic
item.description:
@iDominic wrote:

To clarify for the rest of the viewers:
The reason that FunOrb declined was due to the lack of updates and support.
Jagex pulled people off of FunOrb to work on Stellar Dawn, then again for 8Realms.
Both of which are no-longer being developed.
The sole reason for FunOrb’s demise was Jagex’s bad judgement.

I’m not out of arguments.
I just recognize that arguing with you is an exercise in futility.

Read full topic

Other than to be rude, of-course.

I can post where I like. I’m not the one being rude.
[/quote]
Lol.[/quote]
Clearly out of arguments…
And I’m not “bumping” you, nobody cares about your thread. There’s a reason JaGeX stopped updating FunOrb, nobody played it.

Read full topic
